original_text: People are also like that. A good man keeps good things in his mind. In his life, he brings those good things out from there. But a bad man keeps bad things in his mind. He brings those bad thoughts out from there. When a person speaks, his words show what is really in his mind.’
korean_text: 선한 사람은 마음에 쌓은 선에서 선을 내고 악한 자는 그 쌓은 악에서 악을 내나니 이는 마음에 가득한 것을 입으로 말함이니라

sentences.original_text: A good man keeps good things in his mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 선한 사람은 마음속에 좋은 것을 간직합니다.

sentences.original_text: In his life, he brings those good things out from there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 삶 속에서 그 좋은 것들을 마음에서 꺼냅니다.

sentences.original_text: But a bad man keeps bad things in his mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 악한 사람은 마음속에 나쁜 것을 간직합니다.

sentences.original_text: He brings those bad thoughts out from there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 나쁜 생각들을 마음에서 꺼냅니다.

sentences.original_text: When a person speaks, his words show what is really in his mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 말할 때, 그의 말은 그의 마음속에 실제로 무엇이 있는지 보여줍니다.
